meanings.definition: A set of buttons on a machine or device that is pressed to operate it.
meanings.sent1: The keypads on the microwave make it easy to set the cooking time.
meanings.sent2: She quickly entered the code using the keypads at the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The keypads on the vending machine seemed to have a mind of their own, dispensing snacks at random.
meanings.sent4: His fingers danced across the keypads of the piano, creating a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the keypads stood out against the dark background, making them easy to see.

meanings.definition: A panel of keys for inputting data or commands into a computer or other device.
meanings.sent1: The keypads on the laptop allowed her to type quickly and efficiently.
meanings.sent2: He used the keypads on the security system to arm the alarm before leaving the house.
meanings.sent3: The keypads on the calculator seemed to be in a playful mood, displaying random numbers.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed seamlessly from her mind to the keypads of the typewriter.
meanings.sent5: The sound of fingers tapping on the keypads filled the quiet room with a rhythmic melody.
